title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Job Competencies for Prospective Special Education Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational special education theory and understanding of general pedagogical methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Cultivation of practical skills applicable with over 80% accuracy in behavior modification principles
Design and implementation of three or more lessons utilizing reinforcement, prompting, and extinction techniques
Enhancement of instructional improvement capabilities through formative assessment feedback in collaborative learning environments
Development of two or more flipped learning materials using digital content creation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
